title: missing 400rp
body:
i just reached level  5 on my surf account but i haven't got my 400 rp yet 
can anyone help me?

replies.body: With the launch of the Hextech Crafting system we replaced the new player 400 RP with a special Hextech Chest.  Check out [this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp) for more info/details behind the decision :D
